entry.title: New release for VoucherVault: v1.16.0
entry.content:
[!TIP] Feature: This release supports displaying uploaded images directly in the web application besides providing a download button. Slight UI changes but nothing crucial.

[!CAUTION] Breaking Change: This release enables users, which have access to a shared item, to download and display the uploaded files for it. Otherwise, sharing does not make much sense.

Features

  • support displaying uploaded images; fixes #72 (06bb8aa)
